trans-unit.source: Displays editable text information in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Exibe informações de texto editável em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewTextBoxCell class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> used to display a single string of editable text-based information.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataGridViewTextBoxCell é um tipo especializado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>usado para exibir uma única cadeia de caracteres de informações de baseado em texto editáveis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: The currently selected DataGridViewTextBoxCell hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> control in which the user can edit the cell's value (assuming the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> property of the DataGridViewTextBoxCell is set to `false`).
trans-unit.target: Os hosts DataGridViewTextBoxCell selecionados no momento uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>controle no qual o usuário pode editar o valor da célula (supondo que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A>do DataGridViewTextBoxCell é definida como `false`).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>é o tipo de coluna especializado para manter as células desse tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is initialized to a new DataGridViewTextBoxCell.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é inicializada com um novo DataGridViewTextBoxCell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To pattern the cells within a column after an existing DataGridViewTextBoxCell, set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to the cell to use as a pattern.
trans-unit.target: Para as células dentro de uma coluna de padrões após um DataGridViewTextBoxCell existente, defina a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade até a célula para usar como padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades relacionadas a célula da coluna são wrappers para as propriedades nomeadas da mesma forma de célula do modelo.

trans-unit.source: Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change.
trans-unit.target: Alterando os valores de propriedade da célula modelo afetará apenas células com base no modelo que são adicionadas após a alteração.

trans-unit.source: Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Alterando os valores de propriedade de célula da coluna, no entanto, será atualizar o modelo de células e todas as outras células na coluna e atualize a exibição da coluna se necessário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta célula.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o método Clone sempre que derivam <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>e adicionar novas propriedades à classe derivada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes the cell's editing control from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove a célula de edição do controle do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor formatado associado à célula.

trans-unit.source: The type of the underlying formatted value is always <xref:System.String> because a text box only handles text information
trans-unit.target: O tipo do valor formatado subjacente é sempre <xref:System.String>porque uma caixa de texto só trata as informações de texto</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref:System.String> type in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o <xref:System.String>tipo em todos os casos.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o retângulo delimitador que inclui a área de conteúdo da célula, que é calculada usando especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a ser aplicado à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha pai da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que circunda o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o retângulo delimitador que inclui o ícone de erro da célula, caso seja exibida.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a ser aplicado à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha pai da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que circunda o ícone de erro da célula, se um for exibido; caso contrário, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o tamanho preferido, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usado para desenhar a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha de base zero da célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Tamanho máximo permitido a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho preferido, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: Attaches and initializes the hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Anexa e inicializa o controle de edição hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeEditingControl method initializes the hosted editing control as described in the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O método InitializeEditingControl inicializa o controle de edição hospedado, conforme descrito na base de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For every invocation, this method also sets the following visual attributes of the editing control: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para cada invocação, esse método também define os seguintes atributos visual do controle de edição:-a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> properties are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>propriedades são definidas como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A> property is set to the `initialFormattedValue` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A>está definida como o `initialFormattedValue` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being edited.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: The initial value to be displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: O valor inicial a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: A cell style that is used to determine the appearance of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Um estilo de célula que é usado para determinar a aparência do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o modo de edição deve ser iniciado com base na chave fornecida.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>, the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>, o controle usa esse método para determinar se uma chave diferente F2 for pressionado, o usuário enquanto esta célula tem foco fará com que a célula entrar no modo de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna `true` se o parâmetro e indica uma chave de entrada de dados comuns (como uma letra, número, marca de pontuação ou a chave de espaço) sem modificações por ALT ou CTRL, excluindo SHIFT + espaço, que é usado pelo controle para fins de seleção.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão de teclado e Mouse manipulando em controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that represents the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que representa a chave que foi pressionada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if edit mode should be started; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se Editar modo deve ser iniciado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de caracteres que podem ser inseridos na caixa de texto.

trans-unit.source: The MaxInputLength property does not affect the length of text entered programmatically through the cell's value or through cell formatting.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MaxInputLength não afeta o tamanho do texto inserido programaticamente o valor da célula ou através de formatação da célula.

trans-unit.source: It affects only what the user can input and edit.
trans-unit.target: Ele afeta somente o que o usuário pode de entrada e editar.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.MaxInputLength%2A> property of the owning column also sets the MaxInputLength property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.MaxInputLength%2A>propriedade da coluna de propriedade também define a propriedade MaxInputLength de cada célula na coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.MaxInputLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box; the default value is 32767.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de caracteres que podem ser inseridos na caixa de texto. o valor padrão é 32767.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when the selection cursor moves onto a cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> quando o cursor de seleção é movido para uma célula.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é semelhante de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: As mesmas circunstâncias em que ele é chamado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado, mas ele não gera o evento realmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row entered by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha inserida com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell was entered as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula foi inserida como resultado de um clique do mouse; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when the mouse leaves a cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> quando o mouse sai de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: Resets the instance's click state to ensure that leaving then re-entering the cell requires a double click to start edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Redefinições de clique da instância de estado para garantir que sair, em seguida, inserir novamente a célula requer um clique duas vezes para iniciar o modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é semelhante de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: As mesmas circunstâncias em que ele é chamado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado, mas ele não gera o evento realmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row the mouse has left.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que deixou o mouse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell was left as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula foi deixada como resultado de um mouse clique; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when the mouse leaves a cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> quando o mouse sai de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: OnMouseClick determines whether the mouse click is part of a double click that starts an edit session.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseClick determina se o clique do mouse é parte de um clique duplo que inicia uma sessão de edição.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é semelhante de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: As mesmas circunstâncias em que ele é chamado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado, mas ele não gera o evento realmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pinta atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usado para pintar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados formatados do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro que é associada à célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de formatação e estilo sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que contém estilos de borda para a célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores que especifica quais partes da célula precisam ser pintadas.

trans-unit.source: Sets the location and size of the editing control hosted by a cell in the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: Define o local e o tamanho do controle edição hospedado por uma célula no controle DataGridView.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to have the control placed as specified by the other arguments; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the control to place itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para que o controle colocado conforme especificado por outros argumentos; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para permitir que o controle colocar em si.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the size; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the control to size itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para especificar o tamanho. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para permitir que o controle a ser redimensionada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites de célula.

trans-unit.source: The area that will be used to paint the editing control.
trans-unit.target: A área que será usada para pintar o controle de edição.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo da célula que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para adicionar uma borda vertical para a célula; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para adicionar uma borda horizontal para a célula; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
